content: Probably for a month or two I'm experiencing that lake build eats up all the system resources, even using web browser or typing in text editor becomes sluggish. I'm mostly running lean v4.16.0. Is anyone else experiencing this? I would prefer lake build to take a minute or two longer but not to choke my system.
See #lean4 > number of threads for lake build @ ðŸ’¬
Thanks, setting it to 16 out of 20 available seems to solve the problem!
